Description:
This Outstanding Property Is A Must Inspect!
Set amidst other quality properties is this modern family home featuring four spacious bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe, second bathroom, separate formal living at the front plus a further spacious light filled open planned family and dining area at the rear of home. A stylishly designed fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances looks across to the outdoor covered entertaining area, there is a remote controlled double garage with direct personal access to the home plus plenty of extra space available on the opposite side of the property to install gates allowing for further housing of vehicles, caravans, boats, extra. Features include striking tonings with laminated flooring, tiling, and new wall to wall carpets, window furnishings plus central heating and evaporative cooling for all year round comfort. Positioned in the Aspect Estate within minutes of Officers many attractive facilities including, Arena Shopping Centre, Cardinia Railway Station, Club Officer, Primary and Secondary schools, freeway access, Lakeside Square Town Centre, plus much, much more. Inspect Today, Move In Tomorrow!
Inspect Saturday 1.00 -1.30pm or by Appointment contact Dale 0417 593 182
Photo ID Required

Description:
Hidden Gem In Timbertop
Hidden on a private road in the most highly sought-after Timbertop Estate is where you will find your next purchase. Neat as a pin and light filled are the first thoughts entering the home. Comprising of 3 bedrooms, the master is complete with full ensuite and walk in robe, whilst the other 2 sizeable bedrooms both have built in robes and share a central bathroom with stone benchtops and separate toilet. A carefully thought out floorplan finds the lounge room, meals area and stylish kitchen complete with stone and stainless-steel appliances looking out to the low maintenance backyard with undercover entertaining perfect for summer nights. Additional features of the home include ducted heating, 2 split system air conditioners, stone throughout and a double garage. This home is sure to appeal to a multitude of buyers including first home buyers, down sizers and investors with the added bonus of having great neighbours; dont hesitate in inspecting this property.

Brand New Luxury Park Facing Town House...!! NO BODY CORPORATE.... !! Two Living areas....!!
UpHill Real Estate proudly presenting superbly designed Luxury park facing Townhome with balcony and two living areas in highly desired Kaduna Park.
Comprising downstairs,
- Master Bedroom with ensuite
- Open Plan dining & living
- Powder Room
- Laundry
- Modern Kitchen with stainless steel 600mm Cooktop & Oven
- Stone Benchtop
- Dishwasher
And come upstairs and you will be welcomed to
- Separate living area with park facing balcony
- Two more large bedrooms with generous built in robes
- Main bathroom
This home also comes with
- Ducted heating
- Split cooling
- LED down lights
Short drive to:
- Cardinia train station
- Club officer
- Arena Shopping centre
- Caversham Waters Wetlands
- Lake side square shopping centre

- Officer Secondary College
- Maranatha Christian School
If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Call Chalith on 0452 327 583 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.

BRAND NEW TOWNHOUSE
This low maintenance and stylish townhouse offers the ideal investment opportunity or relaxed lifestyle for a first home buyer.
Boasting over 3 levels, the ground floor includes two car remote controlled garage, European laundry and storage space.
Second floor includes undercover balcony, large living and dining zone, powder room, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and offers abundance of natural light.
Top floor you will find main bathroom, 3 bedrooms, master including WIR, full ensuite and its own private balcony.
Bask in the glory of owning this brand new townhouse in one of Officers prime location. Situated mere minutes from Club Officer, Arena Shopping Centre, Lakeside Shopping Precent, Officers New Town centre, wetlands, walking tracks and an array of Primary and Secondarys Schools.
Officer is in high demand, call me today to secure this property.

Description:
Ultimate Family Entertainer Prominent Timbertop Estate Location
6 BEDROOMS
IN GROUND POOL
AS GOOD AS NEW!
Realise an unsurpassed level of style and indulgence with this immaculately presented Metricon family home situated in the ever-popular Timbertop Estate Officer.
Boasting a generous assortment of separate indoor and outdoor living spaces, this stunning home has been thoughtfully designed to cater for the largest of families offering a plethora of open space.
Sleeping arrangements are well catered for with six bedrooms in total. The master suite is located on the ground floor and comes complete with full ensuite & WIR. Upstairs you will find the remaining 5 bedrooms, each conveniently fitted with NBN data points, four of which boast the luxury of WIR's. These rooms are also serviced by the second bathroom & separate powder room.
A chef's delight, the stylishly appointed kitchen features a huge stone island/breakfast bar, premium appliances, soft close draws and walk in pantry. The main family and meals areas are also centrally located with double stacker doors opening out to the undercover alfresco. Here is where you will find the perfect place to unwind, overlooking the secured inground pool which also features your very own Bali style hut/pool side bar.
Additional features of the home also include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system A/C, NBN data points to all bedrooms, fire pit, double garage with internal access, pool solar heating, the list goes on!
Located directly opposite a reserve offering a quiet idyllic lifestyle, this stunning property is sure to impress anyone looking for a near new home with absolutely nothing to do but simply move in and enjoy.

Description:
WALK TO EVERYTHING
Conveniently located, this stunning 3- bedroom family home is in the heart of Officer. Enjoy tiled and carpeted surfaces throughout an open plan layout with neat and tidy gardens. The stylish modern kitchen features 40mm thick square edgework to the kitchen, dishwasher, stainless steel cooktop and oven.
There are built-in wardrobes to each carpeted bedroom, while the master includes a walk-in wardrobe and private ensuite. A well-appointed central bathroom and separate laundry service the main living areas.
Outdoor entertaining is easy with doors from the open plan living out to the large alfresco. Double glazed windows throughout and gas hot water reduce your energy consumption.
This central location is in walking distance of Cardinia Station, Club Officer Restaurant, Woolworths, easy access to the Princes Highway and Freeway, Officer Secondary College, kindergartens and so much more.
Featuring;
* 3 bedrooms
* Centrally Located in Officer
* Stylish Modern Kitchen
* Ducted heating, fans & split system Air Conditioning
* Security alarm,
* Electric blinds,
* Roller blinds
* Security doors
* Double Garage

Description:
Dreams Can Come True
Save the trouble of building with this brand new custom built home that has had no expense spared from the striking curb side appeal all the way through to the backyard. Majestically occupying a huge 700sqm (approx.) allotment this family friendly home with a personalised floor plan is what you have been waiting for!
Upon entry, the wide hallway and sky high ceilings will instantly give you a feel of elegance. The hallway will lead you past the large formal living area and down to the back of the home where you have your beautiful kitchen that overlooks the family and dining area. Also some gorgeous bay windows that you thought were only seen in movies!
The top of the line stone bench kitchen has all the modern necessities of soft-close drawers (and lots of them), tiled splashbacks, quality appliances that still have the wrapping on them as they have never been touched and a massive butler's pantry.
There are four sleek and lavish bedrooms all with large fitted built in robes and a deluxe master bedroom with a huge ensuite, double vanity and oversized shower. The walk through wardrobe will have all the ladies gasping.
More gasping? You must have just seen the garage! More than a double with extra high ceilings this is garage goals! Sure to fit all your toys with extra storage space under the stairs that lead up to the internal access point.
Multiple living zones ensure enough space for all family and friends, upstairs is the third living area that has views that will take your breath away. This space is quite versatile and can be set up with a study nook or just a great space to lounge. Something very unique is on offer upstairs, the roof has been fitted with electric skylights so the lighting in the space will always be spot on.
Naturally, there is also an amazing deck with fabulous views for outdoor living and entertaining ensuring pleasant outdoor dining in the summer months and great for parties. The deck has been made with modwood, an ecofriendly and low maintenance material ensuring the brand new look stays for longer.
Location does not get any better, sitting on the hilltop across from Hicks Reserve surrounded by stunning views, only moments to cafes, parks/trails, schools, buses, Officer train station and M1. With an extensive list of upgrades, inclusions and features throughout that you must inspect to believe, you will be getting the complete package with this property. So be sure to give us a call!
All information contained herein is gathered from relevant third party sources. We cannot guarantee or give any warranty about the information provided. Interested parties must rely solely on their own enquiries.
Internal area
260m²

Description:
Water Front in Officer
What an opportunity to be one of the rare lucky few, to live by the water's edge, in one of South Eastern Victoria's most sought after locations.
Here is a truly quality-built Dennis family home.
This five-year-old residence offers:
- 4 Bedrooms
- Master bedroom with personal balcony to enjoy the moon glistening over the water, its own exquisite dressing room, walk in robe and ensuite
- 2 Bathrooms
- Powder room
- Study
- Children's retreat
- Open plan living and dining
- Kitchen with 900ml gas stove and electric oven
- Walk in pantry
- Timber veneer flooring
- Under stairs storage
- Outdoor entertaining
- Ultra low maintenance lawns
- 8 Solar panels
- Automatic Double Lock Up Garage.
Positioned within walking distance to the popular Club Officer, Cardinia Rd train station, shops and close to both Primary and Secondary schools.
The last time a home of this location came to market and sold was 2 years ago, so make no mistake with delay here. This truly is a tightly held position to live. Come and inspect today before it is snapped up!

Description:
Theres Something About Mary..
Ideally located close to the Cardinia Road train station, Club Officer, schools, parkland, shopping centres, access to the M1 freeway and all the amazing amenities that Officer has to offer. Young, modern with contemporary toning's throughout, this property would suit First home buyers, investors all those looking for a low maintenance lifestyle.
Offering the lucky buyer:
* 3 bedrooms, all having built in robes
* The master bedroom has an ensuite
* Open plan living area with a tiled meals area
* Modern kitchen features high gloss cabinetry, stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher
* Ducted heating plus a split system air conditioner
* High ceilings throughout
* Private courtyard
* Quality fixtures and fittings
* Double garage with remote control door and a rear roller door to the back yard
* Low maintenance rear yard has a garden shed and a concrete area perfect for entertaining guests
* Heaps of features!
Set in the Arcadia Estate with the Bridgewood Primary School and Officer Secondary School both within close proximity.
An incredible property in an incredible location. An inspection is a must!
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

CORNER THE MARKET

This is a perfect allotment for anyone looking to take advantage of the evolving Officer landscape. For more information including plans please call Matt on 0417 411 883 or Samantha on 0478 178 618.

Description:
CUSTOM BUILT HOME WITH LOADS OF STREET APPEAL
Built up to a standard not down to a price this impressive one of a kind masterpiece will impress the most fastidious buyer. Encapsulating all the modern buyer would be searching for, this unique home needs to be inspected to be truly appreciated. Custom built by the current owner, every fine detail was hand picked and designed with quality and elegance in mind.
Upon entry it features impressive high ceilings and timber flooring flowing out to the main living zone. The grand open plan kitchen is complemented with feature pendant lights over the large island stone bench, an abundance of storage space, stainless steel appliances and a butlers pantry.
The design of this home is impeccable with massive outdoor alfresco area to the rear, 2 living zones, master with WIR and full ensuite and additional bedrooms all with BIR's.
Additional features include modern bathroom, large laundry, remote controlled double garage with rear roller door, shed, side gate entry, ducted heating, split system, heaps of storage, gas fireplace and much more.
Superbly positioned on over 500m2 in the Arcadia Estate you will enjoy the close proximity to the future Officer Town Centre, local schools, shops and Officer railway station.
FIRST IMPRESSIONS ARE LASTING IMPRESSIONS !
THIS HOME WILL SELL QUICKLY
Always Contact LIZA HICKEY

Description:
Start A Winning Life At Winland
Only 45 mins from Melbourne CBD, enjoy easy access to Metro train station and Monash Freeway, surrounded by wide range of quality schools, close to local amenities, Officer has become one of the most sought-after suburbs in South East Growth Corridor for first home buyers and investors.
Peake Real Estate Proudly present Winland Estate one of the finest in Officer:
Only minutes from Officer Precinct
Easy access to Beaconsfield Station and Officer Station
3 minutes to get onto the Monash Freeway
Timbertop Café at your door step
Adjoining to proposed Government School and sports reserve
Blocks ranging from 250m2 - 519m2 approx.
Majority 12.5m and 14m frontage
Stage 1 expect to title Mid 2020
On offer is a 340m2 (approx..) North facing allotment, with 12.5 metre frontage - fits most of modern floor plans from major builders, bus stop and freeway just at your door step, take advantage of small deposit and a long settlement. Whether you are first home buyers, investors or downsizers, you are always a winner at Winland Estate. Start your winning life by contacting Brix Cai today on 0433 925 529 for inspection and more information.

Description:
Family haven in arena
Serenely situated in a quiet court, this magnificent family home is sure to impress the most fastidious of buyers. Boasting exceptional build quality and finishes, a home of this calibre and size is a rare find and a must have! As you walk in the home, you'll instantly get a feel of warmth from what is a versatile and family friendly floor plan. Downstairs features formal living room, large study and flows on through to a family living and meals area. Adjacent is a chief's kitchen with waterfall stone bench tops and stainless appliances with a generous walk in pantry. In addition upstairs has family rumpus room, four large bedrooms, including the spacious master suite with walk in robe and full ensuite. For the entertainers, you will certainly be impressed, with a large alfresco area and continue decking all the way to what is sure to be some of the most impressive landscaping you will see and to top it off you have a swimming pool for the family to enjoy.
Location is second to none, with Arena Shopping centre just a stone through away, schools such as St. Clares Primary and St. Francis Xavier College within walking distance and a short drive to Officer Train Station and the M1. Creature comforts include freshly carpeted, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system cooling downstairs, security cameras, double garage with internal access and all wrapped up on a 468m2 (approx.) block. This is a rare opportunity to secure your slice of paradise, so call now to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Quality living in Grandvue Estate
Whether you are a first home buyer, growing family or a keen investor, this single-story four-bedroom contemporary home ticks all the boxes. A smart layout and quality construction make it comfortable, spacious and beautiful designed.
With master bedroom including ensuite and remaining bedrooms with built in robes, what not to love?
This family home includes open plan family living/ dining and Kitchen area plus backyard space to create a beautiful modern feel. Kitchen comes fully equipped with quality 40mm stone bench tops and stainless-steel appliances dishwasher included. Extras include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, remote double garage and LED lighting in living areas and hallways and much more.
Ideally situated in Grandvue estate which is within easy reach of all life's necessities. A wide range of primary, secondary schools and colleges are at your doorstep, a proposed new shopping centre across the road and the Toomuc recreation reserve only minutes away.
Don't let your dream home get away, book an inspection with our team today!

Description:
BESPOKE LIVING MADE EASY
This meticulously constructed and immaculately presented home is nicely positioned in Officers premium Timbertop estate. The close proximity to both Beaconsfields vibrant hub and Officers vast array of amenities, parks, gardens, quality schools both public and private, shopping centres as well as public transport makes for easy living.
The family friendly floor plan boasts two living zones including formal lounge and open plan family room / dining room and fully appointed kitchen with impressive timber tops complimenting the stunning hardwood timber floors completed with quality appliances in the hub of the home. The bedroom accommodation incudes three generous bedrooms, master showcasing picture window, en- suite and walk in robes with BIRs to secondary rooms.
Desirable features include: ducted heating, wood heater in the family room, 2 x S/S air conditioners, data and TV points to all rooms, double remote garage with direct entry and rear exit as well as side gates and the low maintenance garden completes this picture perfect home.
So if you are a downsizer looking for quality and comfort, small family or just someone who appreciates quality, style low maintenance then this property is certain to meet all your needs
For further information contact Jeanine on 0438 332 411.
Insights: 6 Elton Place, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2019 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
TICKS ALL THE BOXES!
SPACIOUS AND WELL DESIGNED FLOOR PLAN
OFFICERS BEST LOCATION
QUALITY FINISH WITH PREMIUM SJD UPGRADES
An excellent opportunity for buyers seeking a quality and spacious home in a prestigious estate. Brand new, this SJD built masterpiece presents a blank canvass for any buyer.
Set on a 451m2 block in Officers most desirable estate, this quality built SJD home offers all the SJD upgrades such as double glazed windows throughout, Colorbond roofing, 9ft ceilings, 16.6kw Brivis cooling unit, stone bench tops and Bosch high end stainless steel cooking appliances.
The floorplan offers a master suite with deluxe ensuite including walk in robe, 4 double bedrooms and a convenient additional bathroom. It also offers 3 generous living spaces, including a private lounge, an excellent size open plan family/meals area, additional lounge/rumpus room and a study nook. The kitchen is equipped with an oversized stone central bench/breakfast bar, dishwasher, secluded fridge cavity & 2 walk in pantries.
Standouts include-
Professional landscaping
Timber look flooring
Timeless colour scheme
Beautiful tiling
Colorbond roof
Rich timber decking at the front entrance
Pergola for year round enjoyment ( to be built before handover)
When location wont be compromised this is the home- walk to the exceptional Timbertop Alfresco Cafe, amazing Parks/Gardens/Play Spaces, add the feeling that the very best community in Officer provides, this home is set in an exceptional prestigious pocket.
Along with Proposed new-Timbertop Primary school, retail stores and the new Officer Town Centre.
Insights: 10 Claremont Grove, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2020 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
PERFECT STARTER IN ARCADIA!
We are proud to present this beautifully designed three-bedroom home featuring a family friendly floorplan. It will be sure to tick all the boxes if you are looking for your first home, investment or downsizing.
Offering three spacious bedrooms, master suite with walk in robe and ensuite and additional bedrooms with built in robes serviced by the central bathroom and separate toilet.
The kitchen is sure to impress with stainless steel appliances, ample cupboard storage and bench space while overlooking the open plan living area and an additional formal lounge and rumpus room for the family to enjoy.
Outside you are greeted by the low maintenance yard and the undercover pergola deck for all your entertaining needs and your family to enjoy all on a 451sqm (approx.) allotment.
Impressive extras include ducted heating, remote control double garage with internal access and established gardens.
Situated in the highly sought-after Arcadia estate, minutes to Officer Secondary College, St Francis Xavier College, Bridgewood primary school, park, train stations, public transport, freeways and local shopping centres and all amenities are at your fingertips.
